Interface RemoteActionListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
LinkButton
public interface RemoteActionListener
extends java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable

The remote listener interface for receiving action events via RMI.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Vlad Vlassov, IMIT/KTH, Stockholm, Sweden
See Also:
ActionEvent, FloorListener, InsideListener

          Remotely invoked when an action event is fired by a source (button or timer).
